comments.body: I'm confused. Either you are a fag or you aren't.

The majority of society should stick to conservative constitutional free market republicanism. We know it works well enough. But adventurous people who are interested in social experimentation should be allowed to try out ancap ideas. If they work well on smaller scales than they should be slowly scaled up and up. If they continue to work well as they are scaled larger and larger than someday THEN we can out right replace the conservative constitutional free market republicanism with ancap. 

Don't tear down functioning social institutions in pursuit of utopianism. Don't be the antifa of the right.
